title: 107_s1288
content: Amends the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to: (1) expand from 3 to 14 the membership of the Board of Directors. (2) grant permanent membership to the States of Alabama, Georgia, Kentucky, Mississippi, North Carolina, Tennessee, and Virginia. (3) set Board member compensation at a stipend of $30,000 per year, plus travel expenses. And (4) provide for a Chief Executive Officer appointed by the President, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
